Should be able to interact with the business and understand the requirementsBuild technological capabilities and mentor teamExperience with Agile methodologies - Scrum, Continuous integrationAttention to detail, Desire, and ability to work in a multi-distributed team environmentAbility to excel in a short timeframe under short sprintsStrong communication and documentation skills Thanks and RegardsLaxmi KumariTalent Acquisition GroupEmail : laxmi@smartitframe.comSmart IT Frame LLC.
